0.1.0.en:
* first (basic) Version
* basic driver: thermostat, switch, energymeter, temperature sensor, alarm sensor

0.2.0.en:
* added Simple-LOG support
* tiny changes for store release

0.2.2.en:
* fix polling block after failing
* add username option to fritzbox login

0.3.0.en:
* add fritzbox driver
* add status polling ( for fritzbox driver )
* extend property filtering ( reduce memory usage by device )
* fix energymeter units

0.3.5.en:
* switch logging lib
* add options ( allow to pair disconnected devices, log level )
* add plug driver ( energymeter + switch )

0.5.0.en:
* optimize update process
* optimize device/driver structure
* implemented backward-compatibility system
* ready for beta

0.5.3.en:
* improve login feedback & logging
* add battery info to thermostats

0.5.5.en:
* fix log level was not set correctly
* added wlan device presence detection

0.5.6.en:
* improve error handling ( catch most errors )
* added descriptions to a few errors

0.5.8.en: * Workaround for Homey 7.1.3 device storage problem

0.9.0.en:
* Updated for v6.0.0 / SDK v3
* Rewrite in Typescript
* Reworked settings (it show the login state at the bottom now)
* Renamed fritzbox device triggers and added more tags

0.9.1.en:
* Restore old triggers for compatibility reasons
* Added debug-button to send information that will help fixing problems and implement new devices
*Added api method to forward data to other apps
*Improve settings stability furthermore

0.9.3.en: Fixed value parsing problem (introduced in v0.9.2)

0.9.4.en:
Auto detection of supported functionality
Improve blind support

0.9.6.en:
Data update right after paring
Fix switch mode parsing
Improve cleanup
